overview: "Macho Man" Randy Savage joins forces with Sid Vicious to take on Sting & Kevin Nash. The Jersey Triad defend the WCW World Tag Team Championship. Buff Bagwell faces "Rowdy" Roddy Piper in a Boxing Match. The No Limit Soldiers battle The West Texas Rednecks and much more!
tagline: A Tidal Wave of Trash-Talkin', Body Slammin', Tsunami Fury!
title: WCW Bash at The Beach 1999
